title: Emerald-Adorned Diamond Chandbali Jhumkas
materials: meticulously hand-set with Brilliant Cut Diamonds and Emeralds. Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant shine. Metal purity verified and hallmarked.
features: Intricately designed Chandbali Jhumkas featuring a delicate lattice work design embellished with sparkling diamonds. Emerald centerstones add a pop of vibrant color. The chandelier-like structure showcases the masterful craftsmanship, a hallmark of South Indian jewelry design. Traditional Telugu design elements are incorporated for a touch of heritage.
occasions: and festive occasions like Ugadi (ఉగాది) or Sankranthi (సంక్రాంతి). Also suitable for upscale social gatherings and parties.
description: These exquisite Chandbali Jhumkas are more than just jewelry; they are heirlooms in the making. The exceptional craftsmanship, combined with the brilliance of diamonds and the richness of emeralds, ensures you'll be the center of attention. The timeless design blends seamlessly with both traditional and contemporary attire, offering versatility and unmatched elegance. A valuable investment piece that reflects your discerning taste and appreciation for South Indian artistry. Embody the 'Lakshmi Kataksham' (లక్ష్మీ కటాక్షం) with these auspicious earrings.
